```{r libraries, cache = F}
  m <- HPDinterval(mcmc(s))
  return(m["var1","upper"])
}

  return(m["var1","lower"])

logmeanexp <- function(x){
  x.num <- as.numeric(x)
  xstar = max(x.num)
  return(xstar + log(mean(exp(x.num - xstar))))
}

compute_r2 <- function(df,v1, v2, sigfigs = 3){
  return(format(cor(df[[v1]], df[[v2]])^2, digits = sigfigs))
}

compute_mse <- function(df, v1, v2, sigfigs = 3){
  return(format(mean( (df[[v1]]-df[[v2]])^2), digits = sigfigs))
}
```

# RSA model

```{r rsaHelpers}
rsaHelpers <- '
var probability = function(Dist, x) {
    return Math.exp(Dist.score(x));
}
var targetUtterance = "generic";

var round = function(x){
  return Math.round(x*1000)/1000
}
var utterancePrior = Infer({model: function(){
  return uniformDraw([targetUtterance,"silence"])
}});

var thetaBins = map(round, _.range(0.01, 0.98, 0.01))
// var thetaBins = [
//    0.01, 0.05,0.1,0.15,0.2,0.25,0.3,0.35,0.4,0.45,
//    0.5, 0.55,0.6,0.65,0.7,0.75,0.8,0.85,0.9,0.95
 // ]
var thetaPrior = Infer({model: function(){
 return uniformDraw(thetaBins)
}});

var bins = map(round, _.range(0.01, 0.99, 0.01))

// var bins = [
  // 0.01,0.05,0.1,0.15,0.2,0.25,0.3,0.35,0.4,0.45,
  // 0.5,0.55,0.6,0.65,0.7,0.75,0.8,0.85,0.9,0.95,0.99
// ];

var meaning = function(utt,state, theta) {
  return utt=="generic"? state > theta :
         utt=="generic is false"? state<=theta :
         utt=="silence"? true :
         utt=="some"? state>0.01:
         utt=="most"? state> 0.5:
         utt=="all"? state >= 0.99:
         true
}
'

statePrior <- '
var mixture = data.prior.mix[0];
var priorParams = data.prior.params;

var statePrior = Infer({model: function(){
  var component = flip(mixture);
  return component ?
    categorical({
      vs: bins,
      ps: map(function(b) {
        return probability(Beta(priorParams.c1[0]), b) + Number.EPSILON
      }, bins )
    }) :
    categorical({
      vs: bins,
      ps: map(function(b) {
        return probability(Beta(priorParams.c2[0]), b) + Number.EPSILON
      }, bins )
    })
}});
'
```

```{r rsaInterpretationModels}
uncertain.threshold.model <- '
var uncertainThresholdInterpreter = function() {
  Infer({model: function(){
   var state = sample(statePrior) // sample(Beta( flip(mixture) ? priorParams : {a:1,b:100}))
  var theta = sample(thetaPrior);
      // factor( Math.log(state) )
condition(state > theta)
    return {
      state: state, 
  }
  }, method: "enumerate"})}
'

l1.unlifted.model <- '

var literalListener = cache(function(utt) {
  Infer({model: function(){
   var state = sample(statePrior)
   var theta = sample(thetaPrior);
  condition(utt == "generic" ? state > theta : true)
    return state
  }, method: "enumerate"})}, 10000)

var alpha = 1000000
var speaker = cache(function(state) {
  Infer({model: function(){
   var utterance = flip(0.1) ? "generic" : "silence"
    var L0 = literalListener(utterance);
    factor(alpha * L0.score(state))
    return utterance
}, method: "enumerate"})}, 10000)
  
var pragmaticListener = cache(function() {
  Infer({model: function(){
     var state = sample(statePrior)
    var S1 = speaker(state)
    observe(S1, "generic")
    return {state}
}, method: "enumerate"})}, 10000)
  
'


l1.lifted.model <- '

var literalListener = cache(function(utt, theta) {
  Infer({model: function(){
   var state = sample(statePrior)
  condition(utt == "generic" ? state > theta : true)
    return state
  }, method: "enumerate"})}, 10000)

var alpha = 1000000
var speaker = cache(function(state, theta) {
  Infer({model: function(){
   var utterance = flip(0.1) ? "generic" : "silence"
    var L0 = literalListener(utterance, theta);
    factor(alpha * L0.score(state))
    return utterance
}, method: "enumerate"})}, 10000)
  
var pragmaticListener = cache(function() {
  Infer({model: function(){
     var state = sample(statePrior)
   var theta = sample(thetaPrior);
    var S1 = speaker(state, theta)
    observe(S1, "generic")
    return {state}
}, method: "enumerate"})}, 10000)
  
'
```

```{r simulationRuns, eval = F}
priorNames <- c(
  "uniform",
#  "uniform_rare", 
  #"biological_common", 
  "biological_rare",
  "sexed_rare",
  "accidental_common",
  "accidental_rare"
)

priorShapes <- list(
  uniform =  list(params = list(
    c1 = data.frame(a = 1, b = 1), 
    c2 = data.frame(a = 1, b = 200)
  ), mix = 1), 
  uniform_rare =  list(params = list(
    c1 = data.frame(a = 1, b = 1), 
    c2 = data.frame(a = 1, b = 200)
  ), mix = 0.4),
  sexed_rare =  list(params = list(
    c1 = data.frame(a = 10, b = 10), 
    c2 = data.frame(a = 1, b = 200)
  ), mix = 0.4), 
  biological_common =  list(params = list(
    c1 = data.frame(a = 30, b = 1), 
    c2 = data.frame(a = 1, b = 200)
  ), mix = 1), 
  biological_rare =  list(params = list(
    c1 = data.frame(a = 30, b = 1),
    c2 = data.frame(a = 1, b = 200)
  ), mix = 0.4), 
  accidental_common =  list(params = list(
    c1 = data.frame(a = 1, b = 5), 
    c2 = data.frame(a = 1, b = 200)
  ), mix = 1),
  accidental_rare =  list(params = list(
    c1 = data.frame(a = 2, b = 10), 
    c2 = data.frame(a = 1, b = 200)
  ), mix = 0.4)
)


sims.fixed.thresholds <- data.frame()
sims.priors <- data.frame()
sims.uncertain.thresholds <- data.frame()
sims.pragmatic.unlifted <- data.frame()
sims.pragmatic.lifted <- data.frame()

for (p in priorNames){

  inputData = list(prior = priorShapes[[p]])
  rs.fixed.threshold.model <- webppl(paste(rsaHelpers, statePrior, fixed.threshold.model, fixed.threshold.calls, sep = '\n'), data = inputData, data_var = "data")
  
  rs.uncertain.threshold.model <- webppl(paste(rsaHelpers, statePrior, uncertain.threshold.model, uncertain.threshold.call, sep = '\n'), data = inputData, data_var = "data")

  rs.pragmatic.unlifted.model <- webppl(paste(rsaHelpers, statePrior, l1.unlifted.model, pragmatic.call, sep = '\n'), data = inputData, data_var = "data")
  
  rs.pragmatic.lifted.model <- webppl(paste(rsaHelpers, statePrior, l1.lifted.model, pragmatic.call, sep = '\n'), data = inputData, data_var = "data")
    
  rs.prior <- webppl(paste(rsaHelpers, statePrior, no.utterance.model, no.utterance.call, sep = '\n'), data = inputData, data_var = "data")

  sims.fixed.thresholds <- bind_rows(sims.fixed.thresholds,
    bind_rows(
      mutate(get_samples(data.frame(rs.fixed.threshold.model$`0.01`) %>% rename(prob = probs), 20000), threshold = 0.1) ,
      mutate(get_samples(data.frame(rs.fixed.threshold.model$`0.3`) %>% rename(prob = probs), 20000), threshold = 0.33),
      mutate(get_samples(data.frame(rs.fixed.threshold.model$`0.5`) %>% rename(prob = probs), 20000), threshold = 0.5),
      #mutate(get_samples(data.frame(rs.fixed.threshold.model$`0.7`) %>% rename(prob = probs), 20000), threshold = 0.7),
      #mutate(get_samples(data.frame(rs.fixed.threshold.model$`0.9`) %>% rename(prob = probs), 20000), threshold = 0.9)
    ) %>% 
      mutate(PriorShape = p)
    )

  sims.uncertain.thresholds <- bind_rows(
    sims.uncertain.thresholds, 
    get_samples(rs.uncertain.threshold.model, 20000) %>% mutate(PriorShape = p)
    #rs.uncertain.threshold.model %>% select(value) %>% rename(state = value) %>% mutate(PriorShape = p)
    )
  
  sims.pragmatic.unlifted <- bind_rows(
    sims.pragmatic.unlifted, 
    get_samples(rs.pragmatic.unlifted.model, 20000) %>% mutate(PriorShape = p)
    #rs.uncertain.threshold.model %>% select(value) %>% rename(state = value) %>% mutate(PriorShape = p)
    )
  
  
  sims.pragmatic.lifted <- bind_rows(
    sims.pragmatic.lifted, 
    get_samples(rs.pragmatic.lifted.model, 20000) %>% mutate(PriorShape = p)
    #rs.uncertain.threshold.model %>% select(value) %>% rename(state = value) %>% mutate(PriorShape = p)
    )
    
  
  
  sims.priors <- bind_rows(
    sims.priors, 
    get_samples(rs.prior, 20000) %>% rename(state = support) %>% mutate(PriorShape = p)
    #rs.prior %>% select(value) %>% rename(state = value) %>% mutate(PriorShape = p)
    )
  
  print(p)
}


sims.combined <- bind_rows(
    sims.priors %>% mutate(src = 'priors'),
    sims.uncertain.thresholds %>% mutate(src = 'literal'),
    sims.pragmatic.unlifted %>% mutate(src = 'pragmaticUnlifted'),
    sims.pragmatic.lifted %>% mutate(src = 'pragmaticLifted'),
    sims.fixed.thresholds %>%
      mutate(src = paste('fixed', threshold, sep = "_")) %>%
      select(-threshold)
    )

save(sims.combined, file = "../cached_results/modelSims-priors_fixedT_uncertainT_L1.RData")
```

```{r define speaker model params}

  speakerOptimality = seq(0.5, 30, 2),
  cost = c(0, 0.5, 1, 3, 5, 10),
  modelName = c("speaker"),
  prior = c("uniform", "biological_rare",# "biological_common",
            #"accidental_common",
            "accidental_rare",
            "gendered_rare")
  ) 
```
 
```{r run speaker model}

       packages = c("../../models/node_modules/utils"),
       data = params)
```


## Manipulated priors experiment (Expt 3)

```{r manipulated priors expts}

statePrior2 <- '
var priorComponents = {
 "rare": Beta({a: 1, b:100}),
 "weak": Gaussian({mu: 0.25, sigma: 0.06}),
 "half": Gaussian({mu: 0.5, sigma: 0.06}),
 "strong": Gaussian({mu: 0.75, sigma: 0.06}),
 "deterministic": Beta({a: 50, b:1}),
  "uniform": Beta({a:1,b:1})
}

var mixture = 0.5;
var priorComponentNames = priorNames[0].split("_"),
  C1 = priorComponents[priorComponentNames[0]],
  C2 = priorComponents[priorComponentNames[1]];

var statePrior = Infer({model: function(){
  var component = flip(mixture);
  return component ?
    categorical({
      vs: bins,
      ps: map(function(b) {
        return probability(C1, b) + Number.EPSILON
      }, bins )
    }) :
    categorical({
      vs: bins,
      ps: map(function(b) {
        return probability(C2, b) + Number.EPSILON
      }, bins )
    })
}});
'

manipulatedPriorNames <- c("uniform_uniform","rare_weak","rare_half","rare_strong", "rare_deterministic", 
                                        "weak_half","weak_strong","weak_deterministic",
                                        "half_deterministic","strong_deterministic"
                                        )

sims.fixed.thresholds <- data.frame()
sims.priors <- data.frame()
sims.uncertain.thresholds <- data.frame()

for (p in manipulatedPriorNames){

  inputData = p
  
  rs.fixed.threshold.model <- webppl(paste(rsaHelpers,statePrior2, fixed.threshold.model, fixed.threshold.calls, sep = '\n'), data = inputData, data_var = "priorNames")
  rs.uncertain.threshold.model <- webppl(paste(rsaHelpers,statePrior2, uncertain.threshold.model, uncertain.threshold.call, sep = '\n'), data = inputData, data_var = "priorNames")
  rs.prior <- webppl(paste(rsaHelpers, statePrior2, no.utterance.model, no.utterance.call, sep = '\n'), data = inputData, data_var =  "priorNames")

  sims.fixed.thresholds <- bind_rows(sims.fixed.thresholds,
    bind_rows(
      mutate(get_samples(data.frame(rs.fixed.threshold.model$`0.01`) %>% rename(prob = probs), 20000), threshold = 0.1) ,
      mutate(get_samples(data.frame(rs.fixed.threshold.model$`0.3`) %>% rename(prob = probs), 20000), threshold = 0.33),
      mutate(get_samples(data.frame(rs.fixed.threshold.model$`0.5`) %>% rename(prob = probs), 20000), threshold = 0.5)
      #mutate(get_samples(data.frame(rs.fixed.threshold.model$`0.7`) %>% rename(prob = probs), 20000), threshold = 0.7),
      #mutate(get_samples(data.frame(rs.fixed.threshold.model$`0.9`) %>% rename(prob = probs), 20000), threshold = 0.9)
    ) %>% 
      mutate(PriorShape = p)
    )

  sims.uncertain.thresholds <- bind_rows(
    sims.uncertain.thresholds, 
    get_samples(rs.uncertain.threshold.model, 20000) %>% mutate(PriorShape = p)
    #rs.uncertain.threshold.model %>% select(value) %>% rename(state = value) %>% mutate(PriorShape = p)
    )
  
  
  sims.priors <- bind_rows(
    sims.priors, 
    get_samples(rs.prior, 20000) %>% rename(state = support) %>% mutate(PriorShape = p)
    #rs.prior %>% select(value) %>% rename(state = value) %>% mutate(PriorShape = p)
    )
  
  print(p)
}


sims.combined <- bind_rows(
    sims.priors %>% mutate(src = 'priors'),
    sims.uncertain.thresholds %>% mutate(src = 'posteriors'),
    sims.fixed.thresholds %>%
      mutate(src = paste('fixed', threshold, sep = "_")) %>%
      select(-threshold)
    )
```

# Schematic (uniform prior) figure

```{r uniform prior model}
schematicModel <- '
var round = function(x){
  return Math.round(x*100)/100
}

var isNegation = function(utt){
  return (utt.split("_")[0] == "not")
};

var avoidEnds = function(x){
  return x >= 1 ? 0.99 : x == 0 ? 0.01 : x
}

var lb = 0, ub = 1, diff = 0.05;
var bins = _.range(lb, ub + diff, diff)

var DiscreteBeta = function(a, b){
  Infer({model: function(){
    categorical({
      vs:bins,
      ps:map(function(x){
        Math.exp(Beta({a, b}).score(avoidEnds(x)))
      }, bins)
    })
  }})
}

var utterances = [
  "gen",
  "null"
];

var utterancePrior = Infer({model: function(){
  return uniformDraw(utterances)
}});

var meaning = function(words, state, threshold){
  return words == "gen" ? state > threshold :
  true
};

var speakerOptimality = 3;
var speakerOptimality2 = 1;

var fixedThetalistener0 = cache(function(utterance, threshold) {
  Infer({model: function(){
    var state = sample(DiscreteBeta(1, 1));
    var m = meaning(utterance, state, threshold);
    condition(m);
    return state;
  }})
}, 10000);

var greaterThanThresholdBins = _.range(lb, ub, diff)
var lessThanThresholdBins = _.range(lb+diff, ub+diff, diff)

var litInterpreter = cache(function(utterance) {
  Infer({model: function(){
    var threshold = uniformDraw(greaterThanThresholdBins)

    var state = sample(DiscreteBeta(1, 1));
    var m = meaning(utterance, state, threshold);
    condition(m);
    return state
  }})
}, 10000);
'

listenerCall <- '
_.fromPairs(map(function(u){
  var post = litInterpreter(u)
  return [u, post]
}, utterances))
'

literalListenerCall <- '
_.flatten(_.flatten(
map(function(tH){
    var l0posterior = fixedThetalistener0("gen", tH)
    display(expectation(l0posterior))
    map(function(s){
       return {  
          state: s,
          theta:tH, 
          literalPosterior: Math.exp(l0posterior.score(s))
        }
    }, bins)
}, greaterThanThresholdBins)
))
'
```
